title: Jimmy Carter National Historic Site: Park Statistics
body: Park Statistics       Jimmy Carter NHS Quick Stats Acreage Gross Area Acres for FY 2006 - 72.21 Gross Area Acres for FY 2005 - 72.21 Visitation Total Recreation Visits for FY 2006 - 86,016 Total Recreation Visits for FY 2005 - 94,945 Budget FY 2006 Annual Budget - $1,288,000 FY 2005 Annual Budget - $1,191,000 To find out more information on visitation, acreage, National Park Service and Jimmy Carter NHS statistics, visit the National Park Service Public Use Statistics Office.
